description: Sent when a configured timing reference transitions states.

event.Summary: Operational status of input protection unit $v3: $v7

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesSyncInputPUStateChangeNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 8 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesInputPUEntityName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesInputPUPGEntityName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesInputPUTimingInterfaceName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesInputPUTimingInterfaceProtocol i 1 CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesInputPUOperationalStatus i 1

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The unique name of this input protection unit.

description: The identifier of the input protection group(s) which this input
protection unit belongs to.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesInputPUPGEntityName

description: The interface name of this input protection unit.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesInputPUTimingInterfaceName

description: The interface protocol of this input protection unit.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesInputPUTimingInterfaceProtocol

description: Operational status of this input protection unit.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesInputPUOperationalStatus

description: Sent when a configured protection-group transitions states.

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: The unique name of this input protection group.

description: Operational status of this protection group.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesInputPGOperationalStatus

description: System selected timing reference source.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesInputPGSelectedReference

description: Sent when a slot other than the primary CTX experiences a timing state change. Only applicable in SAOS 8.x.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesSyncModuleSlotClockStateChangeNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 8 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-MODULE-MIB::cienaCesModuleSlotName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-TIME-SYNC-MIB::cienaCesSyncModuleSlotClockStatus i 4

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
